welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Peachtree Corners, where Southern charm meets modern innovation. Get ready to experience our beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and lively community. We can't wait for you to explore and fall in love with our city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the gateway for all international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal North
terminals.description: The domestic terminal north at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal South
terminals.description: The domestic terminal south at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines, American Airlines, and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'ATL Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Winder Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
